actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Subcommittee on International Finance (Banking). Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-303.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Finance and Monetary Policy

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to provide insurance against losses caused by the imposition of export controls under sections 5 or 6 of the Export Administration Act of 1979.

summary.text: Political Risk Insurance Act of 1983 - Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to establish a program to provide participating exporters with insurance against losses caused by the imposition of national security export controls or foreign policy export controls.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to provide insurance against losses caused by the imposition of export controls under sections 5 or 6 of the Export Administration Act of 1979.
